name: shsvai

stmt.origin: mp2an(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c1, cph, c3))), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c3, csh))

body.origin:
